name: nfxfrd
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wb(wnf(s0, w1), wnf(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wb(wnf(s0, w1), wnf(s0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wnf(s0, w1), wnf(s0, w2))
-| wb(w1, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wb(w1, w2)

comment: A utility lemma to transfer a bound-variable hypothesis builder into a definition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)
